examples: The police closed in.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
The birds built their nest in the tree.
words.defineEn: at a point inside or within a space or an area
words.defineVi: tại một điểm bên trong hoặc trong một không gian hoặc một khu vực

examples: The heat was really on at work.
That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The children enjoyed a refreshing slice of watermelon on a hot summer day.
On the credit side, the restaurant offers a wide range of choices.
Our company puts the emphasis on quality.
words.defineEn: used to show that an object is physically in contact with or attached to a surface or object
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ ra rằng một vật thể đang tiếp xúc hoặc gắn vào một bề mặt hoặc vật thể

examples: My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
The lingonberry sauce perfectly complemented the roasted turkey at Thanksgiving dinner.
words.defineEn: used to show a particular place or position
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị một địa điểm hoặc vị trí cụ thể

examples: That's highway robbery!
It’s daylight robbery!
He did six years for armed robbery.
He got ten years for armed robbery.
Paying nine bucks for 200g of dried mango is highway robbery.
words.defineEn: the crime of stealing money or goods from someone or somewhere, especially by violence or threat
words.defineVi: tội ăn cắp tiền hoặc hàng hóa từ ai đó hoặc ở đâu đó, đặc biệt là bằng bạo lực hoặc đe dọa

examples: The bank raised interest rates.
Many banks have cut commercial builders off cold turkey.
The bank crash has had a ripple effect on the whole community.
Their bank account was in the red again.
You'll pass a bank on the way to the train station.
words.defineEn: a financial institution that keeps and lends money and provides other financial services
words.defineVi: một tổ chức tài chính giữ và cho vay tiền và cung cấp các dịch vụ tài chính khác

examples: The suspects are in the wind.
One suspects that he is writing with tongue in cheek.
The police searched the suspect's house for evidence.
The suspect has been on the hook in the interrogation room for about 12 hours now.
I suspect the management is dragging its heels on this issue.
words.defineEn: a person or thing that is thought to be the cause of something, particularly something bad
words.defineVi: một người hoặc vật được cho là nguyên nhân của một cái gì đó, đặc biệt là một cái gì đó xấu

examples: Detectives had closed the book on the Hornsey Murders case three years previously.
The detective took after the burglars.
They hired a detective firm to dig up dirt on their rival.
The detective warned the gang members that blood will have blood, and that their violent actions would only lead to more violence and retribution.
The mob boss ordered a hit on the detective who had sent his right-hand man up the river.
words.defineEn: a person, especially a police officer, whose job is to investigate and solve crimes and catch criminals
words.defineVi: một người, đặc biệt là cảnh sát, có công việc là điều tra và giải quyết tội phạm và truy bắt tội phạm

examples: Temperatures hit 40° yesterday.
Yesterday he baked a loaf of whole wheat bread.
I handed in my notice yesterday.
I only started this book yesterday.
The battle lines were drawn yesterday for the fiercest contest in the history of local radio.
words.defineEn: the day before today; the previous day
words.defineVi: ngày trước ngày hôm nay; ngày hôm trước

examples: He continued his work in secret.
Grandma's secret stuffing recipe includes a combination of diced onions, celery, and fragrant herbs.
Their affair was an open secret in army circles.
My student had a secret but my lips were sealed.
The chef used a secret blend of herbs and spices as the seasoning for the famous fried chicken.
words.defineEn: not seen by or unknown to other people; meant to remain unseen or unknown to other people
words.defineVi: người khác không nhìn thấy hoặc không biết; có nghĩa là vẫn không nhìn thấy hoặc không biết cho người khác

examples: For Anne, the call of duty was strong.
The strong winds knocked down several trees on the road.
The manager played his strongest side of the season.
Many people are led astray by strong feelings
Patience isn't exactly her strong suit.
words.defineEn: having great strength or a lot of physical power
words.defineVi: có sức mạnh tuyệt vời hoặc rất nhiều sức mạnh thể chất

examples: Together, the ant colony was greater than the sum of its parts.
They play the guitar together during jam sessions.
The family took a vacation together, creating wonderful memories with their children.
They did everything together.
They stayed together for the sake of the children.
words.defineEn: near to or with something or someone else
words.defineVi: gần hoặc với một cái gì đó hoặc người khác

examples: Drug companies are locking horns in a legal battle over patents.
He locked the door before leaving the house.
I turned the key in the lock.
He turned the key in the lock.
He entered the key into the lock and opened the door.
words.defineEn: to secure something with a lock or seal
words.defineVi: để bảo đảm một cái gì đó với một khóa hoặc con dấu

examples: The school building has a playground for the students.
The workers construct the building from the ground up.
The tall building stands out among the other structures in the city.
The monastery was several three-storey buildings.
The truck carried a load of construction materials to the building site.
words.defineEn: a structure that has walls, a roof, and sometimes many levels, like an apartment, house, school, etc.
words.defineVi: một cấu trúc có tường, mái nhà và đôi khi có nhiều tầng, như căn hộ, nhà ở, trường học, v.v.

examples: We have about 20 different storerooms, divided into freezers, fridges, walk-in fridges, and dry stores.
It's nice to be in this storeroom.
We like to have a couple extra days, just to make sure, in case we extended or anything, but I've had this storeroom up to the overhead, and all the way to the door, full of food. -
words.defineEn: a room where things are kept while they are not needed or used
words.defineVi: một căn phòng nơi mọi thứ được giữ trong khi chúng không cần thiết hoặc không được sử dụng

words.defineEn: a hotel that offers the most luxurious services and experiences to its guests
words.defineVi: một khách sạn cung cấp các dịch vụ và trải nghiệm sang trọng nhất cho khách hàng của mình
